name: FetchMedia
description: Get download URLs for media if possible

Sid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Transcript.

Redacted.description: Grant access to PII Redacted/Unredacted Media. If redaction is enabled, the default is `true` to access redacted media.

$ul: **account_sid**: The unique SID identifier of the Account.
**media_url**: Downloadable URL for media, if stored in Twilio AI.
**service_sid**: The unique SID identifier of the Service.
**sid**: The unique SID identifier of the Transcript.
